case.title: Real Deal down to earth SWF - 50
case.text:
Just a sweet, very attractive, professional mature young at heart, high energy, caucasian woman looking for a genuine smart, kind man who is single...and wants a future with just one woman. Not looking for Friends, "An Arrangement", or whatever its being called these days...I'm searching for the real thing...no games...no boys, no college kids...no in your 30's, a Man, a gentleman...past 48 please, Manhattan preferred. Please tell me something about yourself and a picture, if I like what I read and see I will respond with mine.
Thanks to all, I'm off to listen to music.
